          <title>
            <string language="en">Daytime and night time</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tageszeit und Nachtzeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Journée et temps de nuit</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the correct (right) and incorrect (left) explanation of daytime and nigh time.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die korrekte (recht) und 
falsche (linke) Erklärung der Tageszeit und nahe Zeit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'explication (gauche) 
correcte (droit) et incorrecte de la journée et prés du temps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a explanação (esquerda)
correta (direito) e incorreta do dia e nigh o tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la spiegazione (di 
sinistra) corretta (di destra) ed errata del giorno e nigh tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σωστή (δεξιά) και 
ανακριβή (αριστερή) εξήγηση της ημέρας και nigh του χρόνου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la explicación 
(izquierda) correcta (derecho) e incorrecta del día y nigh tiempo.</string>
